author.title: Sr. Technical Program Manager | Driving Scalable Change & Strategic Alignment | Agile & PMP-Certified | Expertise in R&D, SaaS, and Emerging TechSr. Technical Program Manager | Driving Scalable Change & Strategic Alignment | Agile & PMP-Certified | Expertise in R&D, SaaS, and Emerging Tech

content: A lot going on in AI these days, get used to it y'all! Comment an emoji if you want me to unpack any of the below:😬 ChatGPT keeps lying, and I might be part of the problem 🚀 Google launched Agentspace, and it raised big questions for me about where this is headed 🤖 Klarna replaced humans with AI agents, then pivoted hard to the “value of humanity.” Wanna know why? 💭 How a few rules I set in ChatGPT got me from point A to Z in seconds—pure workflow magic. 🅰️ How I use ChatGPT to untangle ethical questions around Project 2025—and what I uncovered about the mysterious Project 2035. 👨‍🎨 How I co-designed beautiful, functional Confluence pages with AI (and it actually worked).👇 Drop an emoji below and I’ll break it down. Always happy to dive deeper.hashtag#ArtificialIntelligence hashtag#ChatGPTInPractice hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#TechEthics hashtag#AIProductivity hashtag#GoogleAgentspace hashtag#AIAgents hashtag#Project2025 hashtag#HumanCenteredAI hashtag#LeadershipInTech
